thread.title: Promo: There’s One Awkward Moment In The Next Episode Of Koffee With Karan
thread.title_full: Promo: There’s One Awkward Moment In The Next Episode Of Koffee With Karan

author: Rashmi Daryanani
title: Promo: There’s One Awkward Moment In The Next Episode Of Koffee With Karan
text:
Rashmi Daryanani Feb . 20 . 2017 
On the next episode of Koffee With Karan , Karan Johar is sitting down with three other filmmakers – Imtiaz Ali, Kabir Khan and Zoya Akhtar . It’s going to be an interesting one, since all four of these directors are very different from each other in the kind of cinema that they do. And this difference is most obvious during one particular moment of the Koffee quiz, when Karan asks them to name three films Shah Rukh Khan has done where his character is named ‘Rahul’. There’s just silence after! (It’s particularly awkward because SRK played Rahul in two of Karan’s own films, the very popular Kuch Kuch Hota Hai and Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham .) Up next, a special Koffee with some of Bollywood's best filmmakers! #KoffeeWithKaran pic.twitter.com/DObcqIE61j 
— Star World (@StarWorldIndia) February 19, 2017 
In case you were wondering, SRK has been Rahul in Darr, Zamaana Deewana, Yes Boss, Dil Toh Pagal Hai, Kuch Kuch Hota Hai, Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham and Chennai Express . 0
